DataElement.preferredName: Personal Medical History CDR Entry Completed By Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which the data from a form is transcribed into the Comprehensive Data Resource (CDR).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Personal Medical History CDR Entry Completed By
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies._A directive to add the signature of the individual completing the Comprehensive Data Resource (CDR).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Property.preferredDefinition: A directive to add the signature of the individual completing the Comprehensive Data Resource (CDR).

Concepts.definition: A directive to add the signature of the individual completing the Comprehensive Data Resource (CDR).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/10/19 jk Released per CPTAC SME (Linda) for Medical History CRF.  11/6/19 jk created for CPTAC Medical History CRF.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
